name: Late Night Trains Never Run On Time
name_original: Late Night Trains Never Run On Time
description:
Sound optional but recommended for atmosphere.

A short game about waiting for the subway at night.

This project was inspired by my love of walking simulators/slice of life games where the main interaction is exploring and discovering an environment. There's very few moments in real life that force you to do that, but waiting for a late train is one of them.

Estimated time to play: 5 minutes

Sounds:

air conditioner big1 or can be room tone walk-in commercial fridge freezer.flac by kyles on freesound.org

New York City Subway Trains Late Evening by Luftschlange on YouTube
